block.p: LEAD: Tally Last Week in Connecticut, New Jersey and New York

1. Clean Air Act: Vote to amend the Clean Air Act to strike a provision that removes the existing authority of the Environmental Protection Agency and the states from regulating radioactive emissions at Nuclear Regulatory Commission centers, by making the commission the sole regulator.
LEAD: Tally Last Week in Connecticut, New Jersey and New York

1. Clean Air Act: Vote to amend the Clean Air Act to strike a provision that removes the existing authority of the Environmental Protection Agency and the states from regulating radioactive emissions at Nuclear Regulatory Commission centers, by making the commission the sole regulator.
Tally Last Week in Connecticut, New Jersey and New York

1. Clean Air Act: Vote to amend the Clean Air Act to strike a provision that removes the existing authority of the Environmental Protection Agency and the states from regulating radioactive emissions at Nuclear Regulatory Commission centers, by making the commission the sole regulator.

2. Clean Air Act: Vote to amend the Clean Air Act to modify Federal procurement practices to insure that chemicals known to harm human health or the environment are not used as substitutes for chemicals that destroy the ozone layer. Approved 80 to 16, March 8.
There were no votes in the House of Representatives.
KEY Y Yea; N Nay; (A) Absent or did not vote; (P) Present.
